Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: I'm not a drinker myself.
Heard that got taken care of. About time.

I just hope you can figure out a way for things to go back to normal around here. It's depressing enough without having the benefit of the sweet spirits of the gods. Granted, I don't know which gods, but it must be one of them.
Heard you were looking into it. Hurry it up.
I could use some more booze, but I'll talk to you. I understand you're looking to find out why this place became a dry fort.
I could use some booze, but I'll talk to you. I understand you're looking to find out why this place became a dry fort.
I heard you might have some sujamma on you. I could sure use a bit.
I heard you might have some matze on you. I could sure use a bit.
I heard you might have some flin on you. I could sure use a bit.
I heard you might have some Cyrodiilic Brandy on you. I could sure use a bit.
I heard you might have some shein on you. I could sure use a bit.
I heard you might have some greef on you. I could sure use a bit.
I heard you might have some more on you, but I guess you don't. That's a shame.
Got enough for now. Check with me later, though.
Smells like sujamma to me. I'd know the smell anywhere. How about giving a thirsty soldier a little pick-me-up?
Smells like mazte to me. I'd know the smell anywhere. How about giving a thirsty soldier a little pick-me-up?

Smells like greef to me. I'd know the smell anywhere. How about giving a thirsty soldier a little pick-me-up?
Yeah, I love it, and you don't seem to have any more that I'd even drink. I hate this place.
